Description: Ikusamonogatari (戦物語) is the 23rd part of the Monogatari Series. The twenty-ninth book overall, it contains the story Hitagi Honeymoon. It is set to be released on May 17th 2023. It is the first book of the Family Season.

#Etymology.text: Ikusa (戦) can be translated as war or battle. This is the same character used in Senjougahara's name (戦場ヶ原), with an alternate reading.

#Publisher's_Summary.text: The latest issue of Nisio Isin's Youth Ghost Story Monogatari series! Koyomi Araragi and Hitagi Senjougahara are finally married. Shinobu Oshino and Suruga Kanbaru accompany the couple on their eccentric honeymoon, and the itinerary includes an investigation into a strange phenomenon. Koyomi has a plan related to Hitagi and Shinobu? These are the modern-day oddities! Oddities! Oddities!
